item.title: Zenless Zone Zero Version 2.1 Coming Next Week
item.content:encoded:
HoYoverse has revealed the release date for Zenless Zone Zero Version 2.1, and the latest update for the hack-and-slash action RPG is coming very soon indeed.

As revealed during one of the studio's customary livestreams, Zenless Zone Zero Version 2.1 arrives on July 16th. That's next Wednesday at time of writing, so you won't have very long to wait for this one.

Just like you'd expect, Version 2.1 represents a continuation from June's massive 2.0 update. Two new areas, the narrative-focused Sailume Bay and the summery Fantasy Resort, will be available for you to explore, with the former serving as the "central stage for Chapter 2's story".

As ever, you can expect to add new Agents to your lineup as well. The first, Ukinami Yuzuha, is a Support Agent who can empower other attackers and use her tanuki friend to throw candy bombs. Well, why not, eh?

Your second new Agent in Zenless Zone Zero Version 2.1 is Alice Thymefield, an Anomaly Agent whose Blade Etiquette resource can be used to unleash devastating attacks on her opponents. A new Bangboo, Miss Esme, joins the two Agents, providing HP and energy replenishments if she's in your squad.

Reruns for Miyabi and Yanagi will also be available as part of Version 2.1's banners, so if you missed your chance to pick up those two Agents the first time around, you'll have another chance in this update cycle.

You can also look forward to new minigames like surfing, sea shooting, and new fishing spots, as well as new outfits to unlock with a summery theme. There's plenty to look forward to as part of Zenless Zone Zero Version 2.1, and you can check out the trailer below!

Zenless Zone Zero Version 2.1 arrives across PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and mobile devices on July 16th.

Joe has been writing for TechRaptor for several years, and in those years has learned a lot about the gaming industry and its foibles. He’s originally an… More about Joseph
